network

Class VOQScheduler<T extends Message>

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.Scheduler<T>
      • network.VOQScheduler<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - A type of message.

    public abstract class VOQScheduler<T extends Message>
extends Scheduler<T>
    Implements a scheduler that uses VOQs.

    It is up to the extending scheduler to determine what nodes to schedule (see createProgram(int, DeferredSchedulingNode, Tag)}).

    Author:
    Bitidork

    • Method Detail

      • addMessageToSchedule

        public final void addMessageToSchedule(int time,
                        Node<T> source,
                        DeferredSchedulingNode<T> node,
                        T message)
        Description copied from class: Scheduler
        Adds message arriving at node from source at time to be scheduled when possible by this scheduler. If node generated the message, source and node will be equal.
        Specified by:
        addMessageToSchedule in class Scheduler<T extends Message>
        Parameters:
        time - The time the message arrived at node.
        source - The node the message just came from.
        node - The node the message arrived at.
        message - The message to be scheduled.
        See Also:
        Scheduler.scheduleNode(int, DeferredSchedulingNode)

      • scheduleNode

        public final void scheduleNode(int time,
                DeferredSchedulingNode<T> node)
        Description copied from class: Scheduler
        Schedules the supplied node at the given time, and transmits over its output links in this way.
        Specified by:
        scheduleNode in class Scheduler<T extends Message>
        Parameters:
        time - The time to start scheduling.
        node - The node to schedule.

      • createProgram

        public abstract java.util.Set<Tuple<Node<T>,Node<T>>> createProgram(int time,
                                                  DeferredSchedulingNode<T> node,
                                                  network.VOQScheduler.Tag tag)
        Generates a plan for message transmission at the supplied node and time. This method should not transmit any messages, as this is taken care of in scheduleNode(int, DeferredSchedulingNode).
        Parameters:
        time - The time to create the plan at.
        node - The node to create the plan for.
        tag - The tag of the node.
        Returns:
        Returns the set of edges to schedule at the supplied time and for the supplied node.
